00017 
00018 template <
00019   class CHAR_TYPE = char,
00020   int COPY_ON_WRITE = 1,
00021   uint64_t BUCKET_BYTES = 64
00022   >
00023 class bbt_string
00024 {  
00025 public:
00026   typedef CHAR_TYPE value_type;
00027   typedef CHAR_TYPE CharT;
00028   typedef uint32_t  ReferT;
00029   typedef bbt_string<CHAR_TYPE, COPY_ON_WRITE, BUCKET_BYTES> SelfT;
00030   typedef std::size_t size_t;
00031 
00032   enum 
00033     {
00034       BUCKET_LENGTH = BUCKET_BYTES/sizeof(CharT) -1,
00035       BUCKET_SIZE = BUCKET_BYTES + sizeof(ReferT)
00036     };
00037 
00038   
00039   static const size_t npos;
00040 protected:
00041 
00042   struct BUCKET_
00043   {
00044     char p_[BUCKET_SIZE];
00045 
00046     inline BUCKET_()
00047     {
00048       *(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) = 1;
00049     }
00050     
00051     inline CharT& operator [] (size_t i)
00052     {
00053       assert(i<=BUCKET_LENGTH);
00054       return *((CharT*)p_ + i);
00055     }
00056 
00057     inline size_t length()const
00058     {
00059       size_t i=0;
00060       for (;i<BUCKET_LENGTH; i++)
00061         if (*((CharT*)p_ + i)=='\0')
00062           return i;
00063 
00064       assert(false);
00065     }
00066 
00067     inline void refer()
00068     {
00069       *(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) += 1;
00070     }
00071 
00072     inline bool is_refered()
00073     {
00074       if (*(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES)>1)
00075         return true;
00076       return false;
00077     }
00078 
00079     inline void derefer()
00080     {
00081       if (*(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) != 0)
00082         *(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) -= 1;
00083     }
00084     
00085     void clear_reference()
00086     {
00087       *(ReferT*)(p_ + BUCKET_BYTES) = 1;
00088     }    
00089 
00090   friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const BUCKET_& b)
00091     {
00092       os<<b.p_<<"("<<*(ReferT*)(b.p_ + BUCKET_BYTES)<<")";
00093       return os;
00094     }
00095     
00096   }
00097     ;
00098 
00099   struct INDEX_
00100   {
00101     size_t len_;
00102     BUCKET_* bptr_;
00103 
00104     inline INDEX_()
00105     {
00106       len_ = 0;
00107       bptr_ = NULL;
00108     }
00109 
00110     bool operator == (size_t i) const
00111     {
00112       return len_==i;
00113     }
00114 
00115     bool operator > (size_t i) const
00116     {
00117       return len_ > i;
00118     }
00119 
00120     bool operator < (size_t i) const
00121     {
00122       return len_ < i;
00123     }
00124 
00125     
00126     bool operator != (size_t i) const
00127     {
00128       return len_ != i;
00129     }
00130     
00131   friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const INDEX_& b)
00132     {
00133       os<<"["<<b.len_<<"]"<<*b.bptr_;
00134       return os;
00135     }
00136     
00137   };
00138   
00139 public:
00140   class const_iterator;
00141   
00142   class iterator :
00143     public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, CharT> {
00144 
00145   friend class const_iterator;
00146   public:
00147     iterator(INDEX_* indice=NULL, size_t ii=0 , size_t bi=0 )
00148     {
00149       indice_ = indice;
00150       ii_ = ii;
00151       bi_ = bi;
00152     }
00153     
00154     ~iterator() {}
00155 
00156     // The assignment and relational operators are straightforward
00157     iterator& operator = (const iterator& other)
00158     {
00159       ii_ = other.ii_;
00160       bi_ = other.bi_;
00161       indice_ = other.indice_;
00162       
00163       return(*this);
00164     }
00165 
00166     bool operator==(const iterator& other)const
00167     {
00168       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ == other.bi_ );
00169     }
00170 
00171     bool operator!=(const iterator& other)const
00172     {
00173       return(indice_ != other.indice_ || ii_ != other.ii_ || bi_ != other.bi_ );
00174     }
00175 
00176     bool operator < (const iterator& other)const
00177     {
00178       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && (ii_ < other.ii_ || ii_==(size_t)-1 && other.ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00179         || indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ < other.bi_ );
00180     }
00181     
00182     bool operator > (const iterator& other)const
00183     {
00184       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && (ii_ > other.ii_ || ii_!=(size_t)-1 && other.ii_==(size_t)-1)
00185         || indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ > other.bi_ );
00186     }
00187 
00188     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00189     // SQueue.
00190     iterator& operator++()
00191     {
00192       if (indice_ == NULL)
00193         return(*this);
00194 
00195       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00196       {
00197         ii_ = 0;
00198         bi_ = 0;
00199         return(*this);
00200       }
00201 
00202       bi_++;
00203       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)
00204       {
00205         bi_ = 0;
00206         ii_++;
00207       }
00208 
00209       return *this;
00210       
00211     }
00212 
00213     iterator operator++(int)
00214     {
00215       iterator tmp(*this);
00216       if (indice_ == NULL)
00217         return(*this);
00218 
00219       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00220       {
00221         ii_ = 0;
00222         bi_ = 0;
00223         return(tmp);
00224       }
00225 
00226       bi_++;
00227       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)
00228       {
00229         bi_ = 0;
00230         ii_++;
00231       }
00232 
00233       return(tmp);
00234     }
00235 
00236     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00237     // SQueue.
00238     iterator& operator--()
00239     {
00240       if (indice_ == NULL)
00241         return(*this);
00242       
00243       if (bi_==0)
00244       {
00245         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00246           ii_--;
00247         
00248         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00249           return(*this);
00250         
00251         size_t  lastl = ii_==0? 0: indice_[ii_-1].len_;
00252         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_-lastl - 1;
00253       }
00254       else
00255         bi_--;
00256 
00257       return(*this);
00258     }
00259 
00260     iterator operator--(int)
00261     {
00262       iterator tmp(*this);
00263       if (indice_ == NULL)
00264         return(*this);
00265       
00266       if (bi_==0)
00267       {
00268         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00269           ii_--;
00270         
00271         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00272           return(*this);
00273         
00274         size_t  lastl = (ii_==0? 0: indice_[ii_-1].len_);
00275         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_- lastl - 1;
00276       }
00277       else
00278         bi_--;
00279 
00280       return(tmp);
00281     }
00282 
00283     // Return a reference to the value in the node.  I do this instead
00284     // of returning by value so a caller can update the value in the
00285     // node directly.
00286     CharT& operator*()
00287     {
00288       assert(indice_[ii_].bptr_!=NULL);
00289       
00290       if (indice_[ii_].bptr_->is_refered())
00291       {
00292         BUCKET_* bu = SelfT::new_bucket();
00293         memcpy(bu, indice_[ii_].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
00294         indice_[ii_].bptr_->derefer();
00295         indice_[ii_].bptr_ = bu;
00296         bu->clear_reference();
00297       }
00298 
00299       return (*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_];
00300     }
00301     
00302     iterator operator + (size_t i)const
00303     {
00304       iterator tmp (*this);
00305 
00306       for (;i>0; i--)
00307         ++tmp;
00308       
00309       return tmp;
00310     }
00311 
00312     iterator operator - (size_t i)const
00313     {
00314       iterator tmp(*this);
00315 
00316       for (;i>0; i--)
00317         --tmp;
00318       
00319       return tmp;
00320     }
00321 
00322     size_t operator - (const iterator& other) const
00323     {
00324       iterator tmp(other);
00325       size_t i = 0;
00326 
00327       if (indice_ != other.indice_)
00328         return -1;
00329 
00330       if (*this>other)
00331         for (; tmp!=*this; i++)
00332           ++tmp;
00333       
00334       if (*this<other)
00335         for (; tmp!=*this; i--)
00336           --tmp;      
00337       
00338       return i;
00339     }
00340     
00341   protected:
00342     size_t bi_;//index in bucket
00343     size_t ii_;// indice index
00344     INDEX_* indice_;
00345   };

00705     // of returning by value so a caller can update the value in the

00713         BUCKET_* bu = new_bucket();
00714         memcpy(bu, indice_[ii_].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
00715         indice_[ii_].bptr_->derefer();

00744     {
00745       reverse_iterator tmp(other);
00746       size_t i = 0;
00747 
00748       if (indice_ != other.indice_)
00749         return -1;
00750 
00751       if (*this>other)
00752         for (; tmp!=*this; i++)
00753           ++tmp;
00754       
00755       if (*this<other)
00756         for (; tmp!=*this; i--)
00757           --tmp;      
00758       
00759       return i;
00760     }

00769   class const_reverse_iterator :
00770     public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, CharT> {
00771   public:
00772     const_reverse_iterator(const INDEX_* indice, size_t ii=0 , size_t bi=0 )
00773     {
00774       indice_ = indice;
00775       ii_ = ii;
00776       bi_ = bi;
00777     }
00778 
00779 
00780     const_reverse_iterator(const reverse_iterator& other)
00781     {
00782       ii_ = other.ii_;
00783       bi_ = other.bi_;
00784       indice_ = other.indice_;
00785     }
00786     
00787     ~const_reverse_iterator() {}
00788 
00789     // The assignment and relational operators are straightforward
00790     const_reverse_iterator& operator=(const const_reverse_iterator& other)
00791     {
00792       ii_ = other.ii_;
00793       bi_ = other.bi_;
00794       indice_ = other.indice_;
00795       return(*this);
00796     }
00797 
00798     bool operator==(const const_reverse_iterator& other) const
00799     {
00800       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ == other.bi_ );
00801     }
00802 
00803     bool operator!=(const const_reverse_iterator& other) const
00804     {
00805       return(indice_ != other.indice_ || ii_ != other.ii_ || bi_ != other.bi_ );
00806     }
00807     
00808     bool operator > (const const_reverse_iterator& other)const
00809     {
00810       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && (ii_ < other.ii_ || ii_==(size_t)-1 && other.ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00811         || indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ < other.bi_ );
00812     }
00813 
00814     bool operator < (const const_reverse_iterator& other)const
00815     {
00816       return(indice_ == other.indice_ && (ii_ > other.ii_ || ii_!=(size_t)-1 && other.ii_==(size_t)-1)
00817         || indice_ == other.indice_ && ii_ == other.ii_ && bi_ > other.bi_ );
00818     }
00819 
00820     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00821     // SQueue.
00822     const_reverse_iterator& operator++()
00823     {
00824       if (indice_ == NULL)
00825         return(*this);
00826       
00827       if (bi_==0)
00828       {
00829         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00830           ii_--;
00831         
00832         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00833           return(*this);
00834         
00835         size_t  lastl = ii_==0? 0: indice_[ii_-1].len_;
00836         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_-indice_[ii_-1].len_ - 1;
00837       }
00838       else
00839         bi_--;
00840 
00841       return(*this);
00842     }
00843 
00844     const_reverse_iterator operator++(int)
00845     {
00846       const_reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00847       if (indice_ == NULL)
00848         return(*this);
00849       
00850       if (bi_==0)
00851       {
00852         if (ii_!=(size_t)-1)
00853           ii_--;
00854         
00855         if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00856           return(*this);
00857         
00858         size_t  lastl = ii_==0? 0: indice_[ii_-1].len_;
00859         bi_ = indice_[ii_].len_ - lastl - 1;
00860       }
00861       else
00862         bi_--;
00863 
00864       return(tmp);
00865     }
00866 
00867     // Update my state such that I refer to the next element in the
00868     // SQueue.
00869     const_reverse_iterator& operator--()
00870     {
00871       if (indice_ == NULL)
00872         return(*this);
00873 
00874       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00875       {
00876         ii_ = 0;
00877         bi_ = 0;
00878         return(*this);
00879       }
00880 
00881       bi_++;
00882       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)
00883       {
00884         bi_ = 0;
00885         ii_++;
00886       }
00887 
00888       return(*this);
00889     }
00890 
00891     const_reverse_iterator operator--(int)
00892     {
00893       const_reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00894       if (indice_ == NULL)
00895         return(*this);
00896 
00897       if (ii_==(size_t)-1)
00898       {
00899         ii_ = 0;
00900         bi_ = 0;
00901         return(tmp);
00902       }
00903 
00904       bi_++;
00905       if ((*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_]=='\0' || bi_>=BUCKET_LENGTH)
00906       {
00907         bi_ = 0;
00908         ii_++;
00909       }
00910 
00911       return(tmp);
00912     }
00913 
00914     // Return a reference to the value in the node.  I do this instead
00915     // of returning by value so a caller can update the value in the
00916     // node directly.
00917     const CharT& operator*() const
00918     {
00919       return (*indice_[ii_].bptr_)[bi_];
00920     }
00921 
00922     
00923     const_reverse_iterator operator + (size_t i)const
00924     {
00925       const_reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00926 
00927       for (;i>0; i--)
00928         --tmp;
00929 
00930       return *this;
00931     }
00932 
00933     const_reverse_iterator
00934     operator - (size_t i)const
00935     {
00936       const_reverse_iterator tmp(*this);
00937 
00938       for (;i>0; i--)
00939         ++tmp;
00940       
00941       return tmp;
00942     }
00943 
00944     size_t operator - (const const_reverse_iterator& other) const
00945     {
00946       const_reverse_iterator tmp(other);
00947       size_t i = 0;
00948 
00949       if (indice_ != other.indice_)
00950         return -1;
00951 
00952       if (*this>other)
00953         for (; tmp!=*this; i++)
00954           ++tmp;
00955       
00956       if (*this<other)
00957         for (; tmp!=*this; i--)
00958           --tmp;      
00959       
00960       return i;
00961     }
00962 
00963   private:
00964     size_t bi_;//index in bucket
00965     size_t ii_;// indice index
00966     const INDEX_* indice_;
00967   };
00968 
00969   
00970 protected:
00971   INDEX_* indice_;
00972   size_t idx_len_;
00973   size_t idx_size_;
00974   size_t length_;
00975 
00976   inline bool refer_all()
00977   {
00978     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00979       return false;
00980 
00981     //lock
00982     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
00983     {
00984       indice_[i].bptr_->refer();
00985     }
00986     
00987     return true;
00988   }
00989 
00990   inline bool refer(size_t i)
00991   {
00992     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
00993       return false;
00994 
00995     //lock
00996     assert(i<idx_len_);
00997     indice_[i].bptr_->refer();
00998     
00999     return true;
01000   }
01001 
01002   void derefer_all()
01003   {
01004     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_size_; i++)
01005       derefer(i);
01006         
01007     idx_len_ = length_ = 0;
01008   }
01009 
01010   void derefer(size_t i)
01011   {
01012     //lock
01013     assert(i<idx_size_);
01014     
01015     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01016     {
01017       if (indice_[i].bptr_!=NULL)
01018         hlfree(indice_[i].bptr_);
01019       indice_[i].bptr_  = NULL;
01020       indice_[i].len_ = 0;
01021       return;
01022     }
01023 
01024     if (indice_[i].bptr_ == NULL)
01025       return;
01026     
01027     if (!indice_[i].bptr_->is_refered())
01028       hlfree(indice_[i].bptr_);
01029     else
01030       indice_[i].bptr_->derefer();
01031     
01032     indice_[i].bptr_ = NULL;
01033   }
01034   
01035   void clear_all_reference()
01036   {     
01037     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01038       return ;
01039 
01040     
01041     //lock
01042     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
01043     {
01044       indice_[i].bptr_->clear_reference();
01045     }
01046 
01047   }
01048   
01049   void clear_reference(size_t i)
01050   {     
01051     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01052       return ;
01053 
01054     assert(i<idx_size_);
01055     
01056     //lock
01057     indice_[i].bptr_->clear_reference();
01058 
01059   }
01060 
01061   inline void clear_indice(size_t i, size_t n)
01062   {
01063     for (size_t j=0;j<n;j++)
01064     {
01065       indice_[i+j].bptr_ = NULL;
01066       indice_[i+j].len_ = 0;
01067     }
01068 
01069   }
01070   
01071 
01072   inline size_t getLen(const CharT* s) const
01073   {
01074     CharT e = '\0';
01075     size_t i = 0;
01076     
01077     while (s[i]!=e)
01078     {
01079       i++;
01080     }
01081 
01082     return i;
01083   }
01084 
01085   static inline BUCKET_* new_bucket()
01086   {
01087     BUCKET_* bu = (BUCKET_*)hlmalloc(BUCKET_SIZE);
01088     bu->clear_reference();
01089     return bu;
01090   }
01091 
01092   inline BUCKET_* new_bucket(size_t i)const
01093   {
01094     assert(i<idx_len_ && indice_[i].bptr_!=NULL);
01095     
01096     BUCKET_* bu = new_bucket();
01097     memcpy(bu, indice_[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
01098     bu->clear_reference();
01099     
01100     return bu;
01101   }
01102   
01103   void duplicate(size_t i)
01104   {  
01105     BUCKET_* bu = new_bucket();
01106     memcpy(bu, indice_[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
01107     bu->clear_reference();
01108 
01109     if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01110       derefer(i);
01111     
01112     indice_[i].bptr_ = bu;
01113   }
01114   
01115   size_t duplicate(INDEX_** indice) const
01116   {
01117     *indice = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(idx_len_*sizeof(INDEX_));
01118     memcpy (*indice, indice_, idx_len_*sizeof(INDEX_));
01119 
01120     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
01121     {
01122       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01123       {
01124         (*indice)[i].bptr_->refer();
01125         continue;
01126       }
01127 
01128       BUCKET_* bu = new_bucket();
01129       memcpy(bu, (*indice)[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
01130       (*indice)[i].bptr_ = bu;
01131     }
01132 
01133 
01134     return idx_len_;
01135   }
01136   
01137   size_t duplicate(size_t start, size_t n, INDEX_** indice) const
01138   {
01139     assert(start + n <= length_);
01140     
01141     size_t s = binary_search(start, 0, idx_len_-1);
01142     // std::cout<<start<<" "<<idx_len_<<" "<<s<<std::endl;
01143 //     display();
01144     
01145     size_t e = binary_search(start+n-1, s, idx_len_-1);
01146     
01147     size_t last_s = s==0? 0: indice_[s-1].len_;
01148     *indice = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc((e-s+1)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01149 
01150     // if entire bucket
01151     if (start-last_s == 0 && COPY_ON_WRITE)
01152     {
01153       (*indice)[0].bptr_ = indice_[s].bptr_;
01154       if (n >= indice_[s].len_-start)
01155         (*indice)[0].bptr_->refer();
01156       else
01157         (*indice)[0].bptr_ = new_bucket(s);
01158     }
01159     else
01160     {
01161       (*indice)[0].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01162       memcpy((*indice)[0].bptr_->p_, indice_[s].bptr_->p_ + (start-last_s)*sizeof(CharT),
01163              BUCKET_SIZE-(start-last_s)*sizeof(CharT));
01164       (*indice)[0].bptr_->clear_reference();
01165     }
01166 
01167     (*indice)[0].len_ = n>indice_[s].len_-start ? indice_[s].len_-start:n;
01168     (*(*indice)[0].bptr_)[(*indice)[0].len_] = '\0';
01169     last_s = indice_[s].len_;
01170     s++;
01171     size_t i=1;
01172 
01173     while (s<=e)
01174     {
01175       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01176       {
01177         (*indice)[i].bptr_ =  indice_[s].bptr_;
01178         if (n-(*indice)[i-1].len_ >= indice_[s].len_-last_s)
01179           (*indice)[i].bptr_->refer();
01180         else
01181           (*indice)[i].bptr_ = new_bucket(s);
01182       }
01183       else
01184       {
01185         (*indice)[i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01186         memcpy((*indice)[i].bptr_->p_, indice_[s].bptr_->p_,
01187                (indice_[s].len_-last_s)*sizeof(CharT));
01188         (*indice)[i].bptr_->clear_reference();
01189       }
01190 
01191       (*indice)[i].len_ = (*indice)[i-1].len_ +
01192         (n-(*indice)[i-1].len_ > indice_[s].len_-last_s ? indice_[s].len_-last_s:n-(*indice)[i-1].len_);
01193       (*(*indice)[i].bptr_)[(*indice)[i].len_-(*indice)[i-1].len_] = '\0';
01194       last_s = indice_[s].len_;
01195       s++;
01196       i++;
01197       
01198     }
01199     
01200     return i;
01201   }
01202     
01203   size_t binary_search(size_t i, size_t start, size_t end)const
01204   {
01205     if (end == start)
01206       return end;
01207 
01208     assert(start<end);
01209     
01210     size_t mid = (start+end)/2;
01211     if (i+1 > indice_[mid].len_)
01212       return binary_search(i, mid+1, end);
01213     else if (mid==0 || i+1 <= indice_[mid].len_ && i+1 > indice_[mid-1].len_  )
01214       return mid;
01215     else if (i+1 < indice_[mid].len_)
01216       return binary_search(i, start, mid-1);
01217 
01218     return -1;
01219   }
01220 
01221   bool is_refered(size_t i)
01222   {
01223     //lock
01224     assert(i<idx_size_);
01225     
01226     if (!COPY_ON_WRITE)
01227       return false;
01228 
01229     if (indice_[i].bptr_==NULL)
01230       return false;
01231     
01232     return indice_[i].bptr_->is_refered();
01233     
01234   }
01235   
01236 public:
01237   explicit bbt_string()
01238   {
01239     idx_len_ = length_ = 0;
01240     indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(BUCKET_LENGTH*sizeof(INDEX_));
01241     clear_indice(0, BUCKET_LENGTH);
01242     
01243     idx_size_ = BUCKET_LENGTH;
01244   }
01245 
01246   bbt_string ( const SelfT& str )
01247   {
01248     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01249     indice_ =NULL;
01250     
01251     assign(str);
01252   }
01253   
01254   bbt_string ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n = npos )
01255   {
01256     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01257     indice_ =NULL;
01258     assign(str, pos, n);
01259   }
01260   
01261   bbt_string ( const CharT * s, size_t n )
01262   {
01263     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01264     indice_ =NULL;
01265     
01266     assign(s, n);
01267   }
01268   
01269   bbt_string ( const CharT * s )
01270   {
01271     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01272     indice_ =NULL;
01273     
01274     assign(s);
01275   }
01276   
01277   bbt_string ( size_t n, CharT c )
01278   {
01279     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01280     indice_ =NULL;
01281     
01282     assign(n, c);
01283   }
01284 
01285   bbt_string (const std::vector<CharT>& v)
01286   {
01287     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01288     indice_ =NULL;
01289     
01290     assign(v);
01291   }
01292 
01293   bbt_string (const std::string& str)
01294   {
01295     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01296     indice_ =NULL;
01297     
01298     assign(str);
01299   }
01300   
01301 
01302   template<class InputIterator> bbt_string (InputIterator begin, InputIterator end)
01303   {
01304     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01305     indice_ =NULL;
01306     
01307     assign(begin(), end);
01308   }
01309 
01310   virtual ~bbt_string()
01311   {
01312     clear();
01313   }
01314   
01315   SelfT& operator= ( const SelfT& str )
01316   {
01317     return this->assign(str);
01318   }
01319 
01320   SelfT& operator= ( const CharT* s )
01321   {
01322     return this->assign(s);
01323   }
01324 
01325   SelfT& operator= ( CharT c )
01326   {
01327     this->assign(1, c);
01328     return *this;
01329   }
01330 
01331   //******************Iterators********************
01332 public:
01333 
01334   const_iterator begin() const
01335   {
01336     return const_iterator(indice_, 0, 0);
01337   }
01338 
01339   iterator begin()
01340   {
01341     return iterator(indice_, 0, 0);
01342   }
01343 
01344   const_iterator end() const
01345   {
01346     if (length_==0)
01347       return begin();
01348     
01349     //return const_iterator(indice_, idx_len_-1, length_-(idx_len_-1==0? 0: indice_[idx_len_-2].len_));
01350     return const_iterator(indice_, idx_len_, 0);
01351   }
01352 
01353   iterator end()
01354   {
01355     if (length_==0)
01356       return begin();
01357 
01358     //return iterator(indice_, idx_len_-1, length_-(idx_len_-1==0? 0: indice_[idx_len_-2].len_));
01359     return iterator(indice_, idx_len_, 0);
01360   }
01361 
01362   reverse_iterator rbegin()
01363   {
01364     return reverse_iterator(indice_, idx_len_-1, length_-(idx_len_-1==0? 0: indice_[idx_len_-2].len_)-1);
01365   }
01366 
01367   const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const
01368   {
01369     return const_reverse_iterator(indice_, idx_len_-1, length_-(idx_len_-1==0? 0: indice_[idx_len_-2].len_)-1);
01370   }
01371 
01372   reverse_iterator rend()
01373   {
01374     if (length_==0)
01375       return rbegin();
01376     
01377     return reverse_iterator(indice_, -1, 0);
01378   }
01379 
01380   const_reverse_iterator rend() const
01381   {
01382     if (length_==0)
01383       return rbegin();
01384     
01385     return const_reverse_iterator(indice_, -1, 0);
01386   }
01387 
01388 
01389   //******************Capacity********************
01390 public:
01391 
01392   size_t size() const
01393   {
01394     return length_ * sizeof(CharT);
01395   }
01396 
01397   size_t length() const
01398   {
01399     return length_;
01400   }
01401 
01402   size_t indice_length() const
01403   {
01404     return idx_len_;
01405   }
01406 
01407   size_t max_size ( ) const
01408   {
01409     return idx_len_ * BUCKET_LENGTH;
01410   }
01411 
01412   void resize (size_t n, CharT c)
01413   {
01414     if (n == length_ )
01415       return;
01416     
01417     if (n < length_)
01418     {
01419       size_t i = binary_search(n-1, 0, idx_len_-1);
01420       size_t il = i==0? 0: indice_[i-1].len_;
01421       indice_[i].len_ = n;
01422 
01423       duplicate(i);
01424       
01425       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[n-il]= '\0';
01426       
01427       for (size_t j=i+1; j<idx_size_; j++)
01428         derefer(j);
01429       
01430       idx_len_ = i+1;
01431       length_ = n;
01432       
01433       return;
01434     }
01435 
01436     append(n-length_, c);
01437   }
01438 
01439   void resize ( size_t n )
01440   {
01441     if (n == max_size())
01442       return;
01443 
01444     resize(n, 0);
01445   }
01446 
01447   size_t capacity ( ) const
01448   {
01449     size_t i=0;
01450     //std::cout<<idx_len_<<"-"<<idx_size_<<std::endl;
01451     
01452     for (; i<idx_size_; i++)
01453       if (indice_[i].bptr_ == NULL)
01454         break;
01455     
01456     return i * sizeof(CharT) * BUCKET_LENGTH;
01457   }
01458 
01459   void reserve ( size_t res_arg=0 )
01460   {
01461     if (res_arg<= capacity())
01462       return;
01463     
01464     size_t n = res_arg/sizeof(CharT);
01465     n = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0?0:1)-idx_len_;
01466 
01467     assert(n>0);
01468 
01469     if (idx_len_+n > idx_size_){
01470       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (idx_len_+n)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01471       clear_indice(idx_size_, idx_len_+n-idx_size_);
01472       idx_size_ = idx_len_+n;
01473     }
01474 
01475     for (size_t i=0; i<n; i++)
01476     {
01477       if (indice_[idx_len_+i].bptr_!=NULL)
01478       {
01479         if (is_refered(idx_len_+i))
01480           derefer(idx_len_+i);
01481       }
01482       
01483 
01484       if (indice_[idx_len_+i].bptr_ == NULL)
01485         indice_[idx_len_+i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01486       
01487       indice_[idx_len_+i].len_ = indice_[idx_len_+i-1].len_;
01488     }
01489 
01490     //idx_len_ += n;
01491   }
01492 
01493   void clear()
01494   {
01495     derefer_all();
01496     length_ = idx_len_ = idx_size_ = 0;
01497 
01498     if (indice_!=NULL)
01499       hlfree(indice_);
01500     indice_ = NULL;
01501   }
01502 
01503   bool empty ( ) const
01504   {
01505     return (length_==0);
01506   }
01507 
01508   //******************Element access********************
01509 public:
01510   const CharT& operator[] ( size_t pos ) const
01511   {
01512     assert(pos<length_);
01513 
01514     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01515     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01516 
01517     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01518   }
01519   
01520   CharT& operator[] ( size_t pos )
01521   {
01522     assert(pos<length_);
01523     
01524     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01525     if (is_refered(t))
01526       duplicate(t);
01527 
01528     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01529 
01530     assert(pos>=l);
01531 
01532     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01533     
01534   }
01535 
01536   const CharT& at ( size_t pos ) const
01537   {
01538     assert(pos<length_);
01539 
01540     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01541     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01542 
01543     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01544   }
01545   
01546   CharT& at ( size_t pos )
01547   {
01548     assert(pos<length_);
01549     size_t t = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
01550     if (is_refered(t))
01551       duplicate(t);
01552 
01553     size_t l = t==0? 0: indice_[t-1].len_;
01554 
01555     return (*indice_[t].bptr_)[pos-l];
01556   }
01557 
01558   //******************Modifiers********************
01559 public:
01560   SelfT& operator+= ( const SelfT& str )
01561   {
01562     return append(str);
01563   }
01564   
01565   SelfT& operator+= ( const CharT* s )
01566   {
01567     size_t len = getLen(s);
01568     return append(s, len);
01569   }
01570   
01571   SelfT& operator+= ( CharT c )
01572   {
01573     return append(1, c);
01574   }
01575 
01576   SelfT& append ( const SelfT& str )
01577   {
01578     if (str.length()==0)
01579       return *this;
01580 
01581 //     if (idx_len_>0)
01582 //     {
01583 //       size_t ei = indice_[idx_len_-1].len_- (idx_len_>1? indice_[idx_len_-2].len_: 0);
01584 //       if (ei+str.length() <= BUCKET_LENGTH)
01585 //       {
01586     //if (is_refered(idx_len_-1))
01587     //    duplicate(idx_len_-1);
01588 //         for (const_iterator i=str.begin(); i!= str.end();i++, ei++, length_++)
01589 //           (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[ei] = *i;
01590 //         (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[ei] = '\0';
01591 //         indice_[idx_len_-1].len_ += str.length();
01592 //         return *this;
01593 //       }
01594 //     }
01595     
01596     //extend indice
01597     if (str.indice_length()+idx_len_>idx_size_)
01598     {
01599       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (str.indice_length()+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01600       clear_indice(idx_size_, idx_len_+str.indice_length()-idx_size_);
01601       idx_size_ = str.indice_length()+idx_len_;
01602     }
01603 
01604     for (size_t j=idx_len_; j<idx_size_;j++)
01605       derefer(j);
01606     
01607     memcpy(indice_+idx_len_, str.indice_, str.indice_length()*sizeof(INDEX_));
01608 
01609     //copy str into
01610     for (size_t i=idx_len_; i<idx_len_+str.indice_length(); i++)
01611     {
01612       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01613       {
01614         indice_[i].bptr_->refer();
01615       }
01616       else
01617       {
01618         duplicate(i);
01619       }
01620 
01621       indice_[i].len_ += length_;
01622     }
01623 
01624     idx_len_ += str.indice_length();
01625     length_ += str.length();
01626     
01627     return *this;
01628   }
01629   
01630   SelfT& append ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n=npos )
01631   {
01632     return append(str.substr(pos, n));
01633   }
01634   
01635   SelfT& append ( const CharT* s, size_t n )
01636   {
01637     if (n == 0)
01638       return *this;
01639 
01640     size_t k=0;
01641     if (idx_len_>0)
01642     {
01643       size_t ei = indice_[idx_len_-1].len_- (idx_len_>1? indice_[idx_len_-2].len_: 0)-1;
01644       if (ei+1<BUCKET_LENGTH)
01645       {
01646         if (is_refered(idx_len_-1))
01647           duplicate(idx_len_-1);
01648         
01649         size_t j=ei+1;
01650         for (; j<BUCKET_LENGTH && k<n; j++, k++)
01651           (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[j] = s[k];
01652         indice_[idx_len_-1].len_ += k;
01653         (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[j] = '\0';
01654         length_ += k;
01655       }
01656 
01657       if (k == n)
01658         return *this;
01659     }
01660     
01661     
01662     size_t ex = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
01663     //extend indice
01664     if (ex+idx_len_>idx_size_)
01665     {
01666       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (ex+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01667       clear_indice(idx_size_, ex+idx_len_-idx_size_);
01668       idx_size_ = ex+idx_len_;
01669     }
01670     
01671     for (size_t j= idx_len_; k<n; j++, idx_len_++)
01672     {
01673       if (is_refered(j))
01674         derefer(j);
01675       if (indice_[j].bptr_==NULL)
01676         indice_[j].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01677 
01678 
01679       size_t t=0;
01680       for (; t<BUCKET_LENGTH && k<n; k++,t++, length_++)
01681         (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t] = s[k];
01682 
01683       (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t] = '\0';
01684       indice_[j].len_ = indice_[j-1].len_ + t;
01685     }
01686     
01687     return *this;
01688     
01689   }
01690 
01691   SelfT& append ( const CharT* s )
01692   {
01693     size_t len = getLen(s);
01694     return append(s, len);
01695   }
01696 
01697   SelfT& append ( size_t n, CharT c )
01698   {
01699     if (n==0)
01700       return *this;
01701 
01702     size_t k=0;
01703     if (idx_len_>0)
01704     {
01705       size_t ei = indice_[idx_len_-1].len_- (idx_len_>1? indice_[idx_len_-2].len_: 0)-1;
01706       if (ei+1<BUCKET_LENGTH)
01707       {
01708         if (is_refered(idx_len_-1))
01709           duplicate(idx_len_-1);
01710 
01711         size_t j=ei+1;
01712         for (; j<BUCKET_LENGTH && k<n; j++, k++)
01713           (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[j] = c;
01714       
01715         indice_[idx_len_-1].len_ += k;
01716         (*indice_[idx_len_-1].bptr_)[j] = '\0';
01717         length_ += k;
01718       }
01719 
01720       if (k == n)
01721         return *this;
01722     }
01723     
01724     size_t ex = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
01725     //extend indice
01726     if (ex+idx_len_>idx_size_)
01727     {
01728       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (ex+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01729       clear_indice(idx_size_, ex+idx_len_-idx_size_);
01730       idx_size_ = ex+idx_len_;
01731     }
01732 
01733     for (size_t j= idx_len_; k<n; j++, idx_len_++)
01734     {
01735       if (is_refered(j))
01736         derefer(j);
01737       
01738       if (indice_[j].bptr_ == NULL)
01739         indice_[j].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01740 
01741       size_t t=0;
01742       for (;t<BUCKET_LENGTH && k<n; k++,t++,length_++)
01743         (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t] = c;
01744 
01745       (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t] = '\0';
01746       indice_[j].len_ = (j>0? indice_[j-1].len_:0) + t;
01747     }
01748 
01749     return *this;
01750   }
01751 
01752   template <class InputIterator>
01753   SelfT& append ( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
01754   {
01755     for (InputIterator i=first(); i!=last; i++)
01756       appand(1, *i);
01757 
01758     return *this;
01759   }
01760 
01761   void push_back ( CharT c )
01762   {
01763     append(1, c);
01764   }
01765 
01766   void push_front(const SelfT& str)
01767   {
01768     size_t ex = str.indice_length();
01769     
01770     //extend indice
01771     if (ex+idx_len_>idx_size_)
01772     {
01773       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (ex+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01774       idx_size_ = ex + idx_len_;
01775     }
01776 
01777     //shift indice
01778     for (size_t i=idx_len_-1; i!=(size_t)-1; i--)
01779     {
01780       indice_[i].len_ += str.length();
01781       indice_[i+ex] = indice_[i];
01782     }
01783     idx_len_ += ex;
01784 
01785     memcpy(indice_, str.indice_, str.indice_length()*sizeof(INDEX_));
01786 
01787     for (size_t i=0; i<str.indice_length(); i++)
01788     {
01789       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01790       {
01791         refer(i);
01792         continue;
01793       }
01794 
01795       duplicate(i);
01796     }
01797 
01798     length_ += str.length();
01799   }
01800   
01801   SelfT& assign ( const SelfT& str )
01802   {
01803     clear();
01804 
01805     idx_size_ = idx_len_ = str.duplicate(&indice_);
01806 
01807     length_ = str.length();
01808       
01809     return *this;
01810   }
01811   
01812   SelfT& assign ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos, size_t n )
01813   {
01814     if (n != npos)
01815       assert(str.length_ >= pos+n);
01816 
01817     clear();
01818     
01819     if (n == npos)
01820         length_ = str.length_ - pos;
01821       else
01822         length_ = n;
01823     
01824     idx_len_ = idx_size_ = str.duplicate(pos, length_, &indice_);
01825     
01826     return *this;
01827   }
01828   
01829   SelfT& assign ( const CharT* s, size_t n )
01830   {
01831     clear();
01832 
01833     idx_len_ = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
01834     idx_size_ = idx_len_ > BUCKET_LENGTH? idx_len_: BUCKET_LENGTH;
01835     length_ = n;
01836     
01837     indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(idx_size_*sizeof(INDEX_));
01838     clear_indice(0, idx_size_);
01839 
01840     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
01841     {
01842       indice_[i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01843       size_t lastl = i==0?0: indice_[i-1].len_;
01844       indice_[i].len_ = (n-lastl > BUCKET_LENGTH? BUCKET_LENGTH: n-lastl) + lastl;
01845       
01846       memcpy(indice_[i].bptr_->p_, s+lastl, (indice_[i].len_-lastl)*sizeof(CharT));
01847       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[indice_[i].len_ - lastl] = '\0';
01848     }
01849     
01850     return *this;
01851   }
01852 
01853   SelfT& assign ( const CharT* s )
01854   {
01855     assert (s !=NULL);
01856     derefer_all();
01857     
01858     length_ = getLen(s);
01859 
01860     return assign(s, length_);
01861   }
01862 
01863   SelfT& assign ( size_t n, CharT c )
01864   {
01865     derefer_all();
01866     
01867     idx_len_ = n/BUCKET_LENGTH + (n%BUCKET_LENGTH==0? 0: 1);
01868     idx_size_ = idx_len_ > BUCKET_LENGTH? idx_len_: BUCKET_LENGTH;
01869     length_ = n;
01870     
01871     indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(idx_size_*sizeof(INDEX_));
01872     memset (indice_, 0, idx_size_*sizeof(INDEX_));
01873 
01874     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
01875     {
01876       indice_[i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
01877       indice_[i].len_ = n>BUCKET_LENGTH? BUCKET_LENGTH: n;
01878       n -= indice_[i].len_;
01879 
01880       for (size_t j=0; j<indice_[i].len_; j++)
01881         (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j] = c;
01882       
01883       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[indice_[i].len_] = '\0';
01884       indice_[i].bptr_->clear_reference();
01885       if (i>0)
01886         indice_[i].len_ += indice_[i-1].len_;
01887     }
01888     
01889     return *this;
01890   }
01891 
01892   SelfT& assign (const std::vector<CharT>& v)
01893   {
01894     return assign(v.data(), v.size());
01895   }
01896 
01897   SelfT& assign (const std::string& str)
01898   {
01899     return assign((CharT*)str.c_str(), str.length()/sizeof(CharT));
01900   }
01901   
01902   template <class InputIterator>
01903   SelfT& assign ( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
01904   {
01905     derefer_all();
01906     InputIterator i=first;
01907     if (i!=last)
01908     {
01909       assign(1, *i);
01910       i++;
01911     }
01912     
01913     for (; i!=last; i++)
01914       append(1, *i);
01915 
01916     return *this;
01917   }
01918 
01919   SelfT& insert ( size_t pos1, const SelfT& str )
01920   {
01921     if (str.length() == 0)
01922       return *this;
01923 
01924     if (this == &str)
01925     {
01926       SelfT s = str;
01927       return insert(pos1, s);
01928     }
01929 
01930     length_ += str.length();
01931     size_t s = binary_search(pos1, 0, idx_len_-1);
01932     size_t last_s = (s==0? 0: indice_[s-1].len_);
01933     size_t ii = pos1-last_s;
01934 
01935     //within one bucket
01936     if (str.length() + indice_[s].len_-last_s<=BUCKET_LENGTH)
01937     {
01938       //std::cout<<str.length()<<" "<<s<<std::endl;
01939       //str.display();
01940       
01941       if (is_refered(s))
01942         duplicate(s);
01943       BUCKET_* bu = indice_[s].bptr_;
01944       
01945       for (size_t i = indice_[s].len_-last_s-1; i>ii; i--)
01946         (*bu)[i+str.length()] = (*bu)[i];
01947       (*bu)[indice_[s].len_-last_s+str.length()]= '\0';
01948       
01949       for (size_t i = 0; i<str.length(); i++)
01950         (*bu)[ii+1+i] = str[i];
01951 
01952       for (size_t i=s; i<idx_len_; i++)
01953         indice_[i].len_ += str.length();
01954       
01955       return *this;
01956     }
01957 
01958     size_t ex = str.indice_length();
01959     BUCKET_* tail = NULL;
01960     size_t tt = 0;
01961 
01962     //split bucket
01963     if (ii+1 < indice_[s].len_-last_s)
01964     {
01965       ex++;
01966       //copy head
01967       if (is_refered(s))
01968         duplicate(s);
01969 
01970       //copy tail
01971       tail = new_bucket();
01972       memcpy(tail, indice_[s].bptr_->p_+(ii+1)*sizeof(CharT), (BUCKET_LENGTH - (ii+1))*sizeof(CharT));
01973       tail->clear_reference();
01974       tt  = indice_[s].len_ - last_s - ii-1;
01975       (*tail)[tt] = '\0';
01976 
01977       (*indice_[s].bptr_)[ii+1] = '\0';
01978       indice_[s].len_ = last_s + ii + 1;
01979     }
01980 
01981     last_s = indice_[s].len_;
01982 
01983     //extend indice
01984     if (ex + idx_len_>idx_size_)
01985     {
01986       indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlrealloc(indice_, (ex+idx_len_)*sizeof(INDEX_));
01987       idx_size_ = ex + idx_len_;
01988     }
01989 
01990     //shift indices
01991     for (size_t i = idx_len_-1; i>s; i--)
01992       indice_[i+ex] = indice_[i];
01993     memcpy(indice_+s+1, str.indice_, str.indice_length()*sizeof(INDEX_));
01994 
01995     //copy str into
01996     for (size_t i=s+1; i<s+1+str.indice_length(); i++)
01997     {
01998       if (COPY_ON_WRITE)
01999         indice_[i].bptr_->refer();
02000       else
02001         duplicate(i);
02002       
02003       indice_[i].len_ += last_s;
02004     }
02005 
02006     idx_len_ += ex;
02007 
02008     if (tail!=NULL)
02009     {
02010       indice_[s+1+str.indice_length()].bptr_ = tail;
02011       indice_[s+1+str.indice_length()].len_ = indice_[s+str.indice_length()].len_ + tt;
02012     }
02013 
02014     for (size_t i=s+ex+1; i<idx_len_; i++)
02015       indice_[i].len_ += str.length();
02016 
02017     return *this;
02018   }
02019

02022     return insert(pos1, str.substr(pos2, n));

02055

02057     return iterator(begin()+i+1);
02058   }
02059   
02060   template<class InputIterator>
02061   void insert( iterator p, InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
02062   {
02063     uint64_t i = p - begin();
02064     SelfT s;
02065     s.assign(first, last);
02066     
02067     insert(i, s);
02068   }
02069 
02070   SelfT& erase ( size_t pos = 0, size_t n = npos )
02071   {
02072     if (pos>=length_ || n==0)
02073       return *this;
02074 
02075     if (n == npos)
02076       n = length_ -pos;
02077 
02078     length_ -= n;
02079     size_t i = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
02080     size_t e = binary_search(pos+n-1, i, idx_len_-1);
02081 
02082     size_t il = i==0?0 : indice_[i-1].len_;
02083     size_t el = e==0?0 : indice_[e-1].len_;
02084 
02085     if (i == e)
02086     {
02087       if (is_refered(i))
02088         duplicate(i);
02089 
02090       size_t j=pos+n-il;
02091       for (; j<indice_[i].len_-il;j++ )
02092         (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j-n] = (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j];
02093       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j-n] = '\0';
02094 
02095       for (size_t j=i; j<idx_len_; j++)
02096         indice_[j].len_ -= n;
02097       
02098       return *this;
02099     }
02100 
02101     assert(pos>=il);
02102     assert(pos+n-1>=el);
02103     
02104     size_t si = pos - il;
02105     size_t ei = pos+n-1 - el;
02106 
02107     if (si>0)
02108     {
02109       if (is_refered(i))
02110       {
02111         duplicate(i);
02112       }
02113 
02114       (*indice_[i].bptr_)[si] = '\0';
02115       indice_[i].len_ = il + si;
02116       i++;
02117     }
02118 
02119     if (ei+1 < indice_[e].len_-el)
02120     {
02121       if (is_refered(e))
02122       {
02123         duplicate(e);
02124       }
02125 
02126       for (size_t j=ei+1; j<indice_[e].len_-el; j++)
02127         (*indice_[e].bptr_)[j-ei-1] = (*indice_[e].bptr_)[j];
02128       
02129       (*indice_[e].bptr_)[indice_[e].len_-el-ei-1] = '\0';
02130       
02131       e--;
02132     }
02133 
02134     //std::cout<<i<<" "<<e<<std::endl;
02135 
02136     //display();
02137     for (size_t j=i; j<=e; j++)
02138         derefer(j);
02139 
02140     for (size_t j=e+1; j<idx_len_; j++)
02141       indice_[j].len_ -= n;
02142     
02143     for (size_t j=e+1; e+1>i && j<idx_len_; j++)
02144     {
02145       indice_[j - (e-i+1)] = indice_[j];
02146       indice_[j].bptr_ = NULL;
02147     }
02148 
02149     if (e+1>i)
02150       idx_len_ -= (e-i+1);
02151     
02152     return *this;
02153   }
02154   
02155   iterator erase ( iterator position )
02156   {
02157     size_t i = position - begin();
02158     erase(i, 1);
02159     return iterator(begin()+i);
02160   }
02161   
02162   iterator erase ( iterator first, iterator last )
02163   {
02164     uint64_t i = first - begin();
02165     uint64_t j = last - begin();
02166     erase(i, j-i);
02167     return iterator(begin()+i);
02168   }
02169   
02170 
02171   SelfT& replace ( size_t pos1, size_t n1,   const SelfT& str )
02172   {
02173     erase(pos1, n1);
02174 
02175     if (str.length()==0)
02176       return *this;
02177 
02178     if (pos1>1)
02179       insert(pos1-1, str);
02180     else
02181       push_front(str);
02182     
02183     return *this;
02184   }
02185   
02186   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, const SelfT& str )
02187   {
02188     assert(i1<=i2);
02189     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02190     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02191     return replace(i, j-i+1, str);
02192   }
02193 
02194   SelfT& replace ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str, size_t pos2, size_t n2 )
02195   {
02196     return replace(pos1, n1, str.substr(pos2, n2));
02197   }
02198   
02199 
02200   SelfT& replace ( size_t pos1, size_t n1,   const char* s, size_t n2 )
02201   {
02202     SelfT ss(s, n2);
02203     //ss.attach(s, n2);
02204     return replace(pos1, n1, ss);
02205   }
02206   
02207   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, const CharT* s, size_t n2 )
02208   {
02209     assert(i1<=i2);
02210     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02211     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02212     return replace(i, j-i+1, s, n2);
02213   }
02214   
02215 
02216   SelfT& replace ( size_t pos1, size_t n1,   const CharT* s )
02217   {
02218     SelfT ss(s);
02219     //ss.attach(s);
02220     return replace(pos1, n1, ss);
02221   }
02222   
02223   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, const CharT* s )
02224   {
02225     assert(i1<=i2);
02226     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02227     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02228     return replace(i, j-i+1, s);
02229   }

02231   SelfT& replace ( size_t pos1, size_t n1,   size_t n2, CharT c )
02232   {
02233     SelfT ss(n2, c);
02234     return replace(pos1, n1, ss);
02235   }
02236   
02237   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, size_t n2, CharT c )
02238   {
02239     assert(i1<=i2);
02240     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02241     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02242     
02243     return replace(i, j-i+1, n2, c);
02244   }
02245   
02246 
02247   template<class InputIterator>
02248   SelfT& replace ( iterator i1, iterator i2, InputIterator j1, InputIterator j2 )
02249   {
02250     assert(i1<=i2);
02251     uint64_t i = i1 - begin();
02252     uint64_t j = i2 - begin();
02253     SelfT s1 = substr(i, j-i+1);
02254     SelfT s2 = substr(j+1);
02255     assign(s1);
02256     append<InputIterator>(j1, j2);
02257     append(s2);
02258 
02259     return *this;
02260   }
02261 
02262   size_t copy ( CharT* s, size_t n, size_t pos = 0) const
02263   {
02264     if (pos + n >= length_)
02265       n = length_-pos;
02266     
02267     size_t i = binary_search(pos, 0, idx_len_-1);
02268     size_t e = binary_search(pos+n-1, i, idx_len_-1);
02269     size_t il = i==0?0 : indice_[i-1].len_;
02270     size_t si = pos - il;
02271 
02272     if (e == i)
02273     {
02274       for (size_t j=0; j<n; j++)
02275       {
02276         s[j] = (*indice_[i].bptr_)[j+si];
02277       }
02278       
02279       return n;
02280 
02281     }
02282 
02283     for (size_t j=i,k=0; j<=e; j++)
02284     {
02285       size_t t = 0;
02286       if (j==i)
02287         t = si;
02288 
02289       for (; (*indice_[i].bptr_)[t]!='\0' && k<n; t++,k++)
02290         s[k] = (*indice_[j].bptr_)[t];
02291       
02292     }
02293     
02294     return n;
02295   }
02296 
02297   void swap ( SelfT& str )
02298   {
02299     SelfT s = str;
02300     str = *this;
02301     *this = s;
02302   }

02307   size_t find ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02308   {
02309     size_t i = Algorithm<SelfT>::KMP(substr(pos), str);
02310     if (i == (size_t)-1)
02311       return -1;
02312     
02313     return pos + i;
02314   }

02319     //ss.attach(s, n);
02320     
02321     return find(ss, pos);
02322   }

02325   {
02326     SelfT ss(s);
02327     //ss.attach(s);
02328     
02329     return find(ss, pos);
02330   }
02331   
02332   size_t find ( CharT c, size_t pos = 0 ) const
02333   {
02334     size_t r = 0;
02335     
02336     for (const_iterator i =begin()+pos; i<end(); i++, r++)
02337       if (*i==c)
02338         return r+pos;
02339     
02340     return -1;
02341   }
02342 
02343   size_t rfind ( const SelfT& str, size_t pos = npos ) const
02344   {
02345     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02346     
02347     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), str);
02348   }
02349   
02350   size_t rfind ( const char* s, size_t pos, size_t n ) const
02351   {
02352     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02353     
02354     SelfT ss(s, n);
02355     //ss.attach(s, n);
02356     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), ss);
02357   }
02358   
02359   size_t rfind ( const CharT* s, size_t pos = npos ) const
02360   {
02361     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02362     
02363     SelfT ss(s);
02364     //ss.attach(s);
02365     return Algorithm<SelfT>::rKMP(substr(0, (pos!=npos? pos+1: npos)), ss);
02366   }
02367   
02368   size_t rfind ( CharT c, size_t pos = npos ) const
02369   {
02370     assert(pos == npos || pos<length_);
02371 
02372     if (pos == npos)
02373       pos = length_ -1;
02374     
02375     size_t r = pos;
02376     for (const_reverse_iterator i =rbegin()+(length_-1-pos); i<rend(); i++, r--)
02377       if (*i==c)
02378         return r;
02379     
02380     return -1;
02381   }

02406   SelfT substr ( size_t pos = 0, size_t n = npos ) const
02407   {
02408     return SelfT(*this, pos, n);
02409   }
02410 
02411   int compare ( const SelfT& str ) const
02412   {
02413     const_iterator i=str.begin();
02414     const_iterator j=begin();
02415     for (; i!=str.end() && j!=end(); i++,j++)
02416     {
02417       if (*j>*i)
02418         return 1;
02419       if (*j<*i)
02420         return -1;
02421     }
02422 
02423     if (i==str.end() && j==end())
02424       return 0;
02425     
02426     if (j== end())
02427       return -1;
02428 
02429     return 1;
02430   }
02431   
02432   int compare ( const CharT* s ) const
02433   {
02434     size_t len = getLen(s);
02435     
02436     size_t i=0;
02437     const_iterator it = begin();
02438     
02439     for (; it!=end() && i<len; i++, it++)
02440     {
02441       //std::cout<<*it<<"  "<<s[i]<<std::endl;
02442       if (*it>s[i])
02443         return 1;
02444       if (*it<s[i])
02445         return -1;
02446     }
02447 
02448     //std::cout<<i<<" "<<length_<<" "<<len<<std::endl;
02449     
02450     if (i==length_ && i==len)
02451       return 0;
02452     if (i== length_)
02453       return -1;
02454 
02455     return 1;
02456   }
02457   
02458   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str ) const
02459   {
02460     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str);
02461   }

02464   {

02466   }
02467   
02468   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const SelfT& str, size_t pos2, size_t n2 ) const
02469   {
02470     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str.substr(pos2, n2));
02471   }
02472   
02473   int compare ( size_t pos1, size_t n1, const CharT* s, size_t n2) const
02474   {
02475     SelfT str(s, n2);
02476     return substr(*this, pos1, n1).compare(str);
02477   }

02479   std::vector<CharT> cast_std_vector()
02480   {
02481     std::vector<CharT> v;
02482     v.resize(length_);
02483     for (const_iterator i =begin();i!=end(); i++)
02484       v.push_back(*i);
02485 
02486     return v;
02487   }
02488   
02489   std::string cast_std_string()
02490   {
02491     std::string v;
02492     v.reserve(length_);
02493     for (const_iterator i =begin();i!=end(); i++)
02494       v += (*i);
02495 
02496     return v;
02497 
02498   }

02503   
02504   friend class boost::serialization::access;
02505   template<class Archive>
02506   void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)  const
02507   {
02508     ar & length_;
02509     ar & idx_len_;
02510     ar & idx_size_;
02511 
02512     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
02513     {
02514       ar & indice_[i].len_;
02515       ar.save_binary(indice_[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
02516     }
02517   }
02518 
02519   template<class Archive>
02520   void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
02521   {
02522     clear();
02523     
02524     ar & length_;
02525     ar & idx_len_;
02526     ar & idx_size_;
02527 
02528     indice_ = (INDEX_*)hlmalloc(idx_size_*sizeof(INDEX_));
02529     clear_indice(0, idx_size_);
02530     
02531     for (size_t i=0; i<idx_len_; i++)
02532     {
02533       ar & indice_[i].len_;
02534       indice_[i].bptr_ = new_bucket();
02535       ar.load_binary(indice_[i].bptr_, BUCKET_SIZE);
02536     }
02537   }

02540 
02541 friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const SelfT& str)
02542   {
02543     for (const_iterator i =str.begin(); i!=str.end(); i++)
02544       os<<(char)*i;
02545 
02546     return os;
02547   }

02550   {

02554     }
02555   }
